00009 public class Season extends DbObject {
00010 
00012     private static final String[] TABLE_NAME = {"Season"};
00014     private static final String ID_FIELD = "ID";
00016     private static final String[] FIELDS = {"ID", "Name", "Series"};
00017 
00018     public Season() {
00019         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00020         db = new MySqlDb();
00021         // No data loading by default
00022         //fetch();

00025     public Season(int seriesId) {
00026         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00027         db = new MySqlDb();
00028         fetch(seriesId);
00029     }
00030 
00038     public final void fetch(int series) {
00039         this.currentId = series;
00040         String[] idFields = null;
00041         String[] ids = null;
00042         if (currentId != 0) {
00043             idFields =  new String[1];
00044             idFields[0] = "series";
00045             ids = new String[1];
00046             ids[0] = String.valueOf(currentId);
00047         } 
00048         
00049         list.clear();
00050 
00051         try {
00052             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00053             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLE_NAME, null, idFields , ids, null));
00054             while (rs.next()) {
00055                 String id = rs.getString(FIELDS[0]);
00056                 String name = rs.getString(FIELDS[1]);
00057                 String seriesId = rs.getString(FIELDS[2]);
00058                 Data season = new Data(Integer.parseInt(id.trim()),
00059                         name, Integer.parseInt(seriesId.trim()));
00060                 list.put(id, season);
00061             }
00062         } catch (Exception e) {
00063             System.err.println("Failed to read season data: " + e.toString());
00064         }
00065     }
00066 
00070     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00071 
00073         Integer field_series;
00074 
00075         Data(String name) {
00076             field_id = null;
00077             field_name = name;
00078             field_series = 0;
00079         }
00080          
00081         Data(String name, int series) {
00082             field_id = null;
00083             field_name = name;
00084             field_series = series;
00085         }
00086 
00087         Data(Integer id, String name, int series) {
00088             field_id = id;
00089             field_name = name;
00090             field_series = series;
00091         }
00092 
00094         @Override
00095         public String toString() {
00096             return field_name;
00097         }
